reference.title: Resolve code references (codref)
reference.shortdesc: The coderef module resolves references made with the <coderef> element, which was added in DITA 1.2. This module is available in DITA-OT 1.5 and later.

section.p: The <coderef> element is used inside of <codeblock> to reference code stored externally in non-XML documents. During the pre-process step, this Java module pulls the referenced content into the <codeblock> element.
